00027 class SignColors {
00028 public:
00029    SignColors( GDUtils::Color::imageColor tColor,
00030                GDUtils::Color::imageColor fColor,
00031                GDUtils::Color::imageColor bColor )
00032          : textColor( tColor ), frontColor( fColor ), backColor( bColor )
00033    {}
00034 
00035    SignColors() 
00036          : textColor( GDUtils::Color::BLACK ), 
00037            frontColor( GDUtils::Color::BLACK ), 
00038            backColor( GDUtils::Color::BLACK )
00039    {}
00040 
00041    bool operator == ( const SignColors& other ) const {
00042       return
00043          textColor == other.textColor &&
00044          frontColor == other.frontColor &&
00045          backColor == other.backColor;
00046    }
00047 
00048    GDUtils::Color::imageColor textColor;
00049    GDUtils::Color::imageColor frontColor;
00050    GDUtils::Color::imageColor backColor;
00051 
00055    void load( const Packet* p, int& pos );
00056 
00060    void save( Packet* p, int& pos ) const;
00061 
00065    uint32 getSizeInPacket() const;
00066 
00070    bool operator < ( const SignColors& o ) const;
00071 };

00180 SignPost::getColors() const {

00199 inline bool 
00200 SignPost::operator < ( const SignPost& o ) const {
00201    if ( m_stringCode != o.m_stringCode ) {
00202       return m_stringCode < o.m_stringCode;
00203    } else if ( m_dist != o.m_dist ) {
00204       return m_dist < o.m_dist;
00205    } else {
00206       return m_colors < o.m_colors;
00207    }
00208 }
00209 
00210 inline bool
00211 SignColors::operator < ( const SignColors& o ) const {
00212    if ( textColor != o.textColor ) {
00213       return textColor < o.textColor;
00214    } else if ( frontColor != o.frontColor ) {
00215       return frontColor < o.frontColor;
00216    } else { // if backColor != o.backColor 
00217       return backColor < o.backColor;
00218    }
00219 }
